page.title: 15Religion
page.content: There is no Church in Netherton,but it is in the parish of Alwinton with Holystone. Services are held at Alwinton at 0930 and at Holystone at 1100. People from Netherton usually attend at Alwinton.About 6 people are regular attenders. The United Reform Chuirch is at Thropton,but very few attend there regularly. There is a Roman Catholic Chapel once part of Biddlestone Hall but this is no longer in use.The nearest church is at Thropton. Some attend at the Meeting House of the Plymouth Brethren. Once a year there is a Harvest Service run jointly by the Anglican and United Reform Church in the Village Hall.Money made at an auction of the produce is donated to Cancer Research.
